00034 ## Class representing a Category, that owns a set of assigned App Objects.
00035 #
00036 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00037 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00038 class Category:
00039    
00040         ## Inicialize the Category values. Be carefull with string encoding.
00041         #
00042         # @param  values - (list[3]) The Category values.
00043         def __init__(self,values):
00044                 if values[0] is not None:
00045                         if isinstance(values[0], unicode): self.__name =  values[0].encode('utf8')
00046                         else:self.__name =  values[0]           
00047                 else: self.__name = ""
00048                 
00049                 self.__included = 0
00050                 
00051                 if values[1] is not None: 
00052                         if isinstance(values[1], unicode): self.__label = values[1].encode('utf8')
00053                         else: self.__label = values[1]
00054                 else: self.__label = ""
00055 
00056                 if values[2] is not None: 
00057                         if isinstance(values[2], unicode): self.__description = values[2].encode('utf8')
00058                         else: self.__description = values[2]
00059                 else: self.__description = ""
00060 
00061                 self.__apps = []
00062                 
00063                 self.__to_save = 0
00064                 
00065                 self.__html_file = self.__label + ".html"
00066   
00067         ## Compare this Categpry to other.
00068         #
00069         # @param other - (Category |  None) Object to compare with this.
00070         # @return \b -1 If this < other. \b 0 If this = other. \b 1 If this > other on other = None
00071         def __cmp__(self,other):
00072                 if other == None:
00073                         return 1
00074                 if self.__name.lower() > other.get_name().lower():
00075                         return 1
00076                 elif self.__name.lower() == other.get_name().lower():
00077                         return 0
00078                 else:
00079                         return -1
00080         
00081         ## Select this Category.
00082         #
00083         def select_category(self):
00084                 self.__included = 1
00085     
00086         ## Unselect this Category.
00087         #
00088         def unselect_category(self):
00089                 self.__included = 0
00090    
00091         ## Select the App in this Category with the name is the same as \em name.
00092         #
00093         # @param name - App name
00094         # @return \b 1 If it's selected. \b 0 If not.
00095         def select_application(self,name):
00096                 for app in self.__apps:
00097                         if name.lower() == app.get_name().lower():
00098                                 app.select_app()
00099                                 return 1
00100                 return 0
00101 
00102         ## Unselect the App in this Category with the name is the same as \em name.
00103         #
00104         # @param name - App name.
00105         # @return \b 1 If it's unselected. \b 0 If not.
00106         def unselect_application(self,name):
00107                 for app in self.__apps:
00108                         if name.lower() == app.get_name().lower():
00109                                 app.unselect_app()
00110                                 return 1
00111                 return 0
00112 
00113         ## Download all the software of selected App Objects in this Category.
00114         #
00115         # @param software_dir - Path to the software directory.
00116         def download_software(self,software_dir):
00117                 for app in self.__apps:
00118                         if app.is_included():
00119                                 app.download_software(software_dir)
00120

00137         ## Delete the App with \em app_name fron this Category.
00138         #
00139         # @param app_name - App name.
00140         def del_application(self,app_name):
00141                 result_list = []
00142                 delete  =  0
00143                 for app in self.__apps:
00144                         if app.get_name().lower() != app_name.lower():
00145                                 result_list.append(app)
00146                         else:
00147                                 app.del_category(self.__label)
00148                                 delete = 1
00149                 self.__apps = result_list
00150                 self.__apps.sort()
00151                 return delete

00191         ## Return a Category dictionary with all App Objects dictionaries in it.
00192         #
00193         # @return The Category Dictionary.
00194         def get_category_dict(self):
00195                 apps = []
00196                 for app in self.__apps:
00197                         apps.append( app.get_app_dict() )
00198                 return {'name':self.__name,
00199                         'included':self.__included,
00200                         'label':self.__label,
00201                         'description':self.__description,
00202                         'html_file':self.__html_file,
00203                         'apps':apps}

00218         ## Generate the Category XML element.
00219         #
00220         # @return Category XML \em Element.
00221         def gen_xml_element(self):
00222                 category= Element("CATEGORY")
00223                 name = SubElement(category,"CAT_NAME")
00224                 name.text = self.__name.decode('utf8')
00225                 label = SubElement(category,"CAT_LABEL")
00226                 label.text = self.__label.decode('utf8')
00227                 description = SubElement(category,"CAT_DESCRIPTION")
00228                 description.text = self.__description.decode('utf8')
00229                 return category

00264         ## Static method. Find a Category with some label in a Category List.
00265         #
00266         # @param cat_list - (list[]) Category list.
00267         # @param cat_label - Category Label.
00268         # @return \c Category Object or None.
00269         def find_category(self, cat_list, cat_label):
00270                 #TODO: Optimize this method
00271                 cat_list.sort()
00272                 for cat in cat_list:
00273                         if cat.get_label().lower() == cat_label.lower():
00274                                 return cat
00275                 return None

00413         #
00414         # @param other - Object.
00415         # @return \b -1 - If this < other.\b 0 - If this = other.\b 1 - If this > other on other = None.
00416         def __cmp__(self,other):
00417                 if other == None:
00418                         return 1
00419                 if self.__name.lower() > other.get_name().lower():
00420                         return 1
00421                 elif self.__name.lower() == other.get_name().lower():
00422                         return 0
00423                 else:
00424                 
00425                         return -1

00450         ## Download the App's icon.
00451         #
00452         # If it can't download it. The \em icon_url is going to be delete.
00453         # @param icon_dir - The icon directory path.
00454         def download_icon(self, icon_dir):
00455                 try:
00456                         if not os.path.exists(icon_dir+"/"+self.__icon):
00457                                 if self.__icon_url != None:
00458                                         sys.stderr.write("!! Getting " + self.__icon + "... ")
00459                                         if urllib.urlretrieve(self.__icon_url, icon_dir + "/" + self.__icon):
00460                                                 sys.stderr.write("Done\n")
00461                 except Exception, e:
00462                         sys.stderr.write("\nEE Error downloading application's icon from \"" + self.__name + "\".\n")
00463                         sys.stderr.write(str(e) + "\n") 
00464                         self.__icon_url = "" 
00465                         self.__to_save = 1
00466                         pass
00467         
00468         ## Download the application's offline manuals. 
00469         #
00470         # If any manual don't download correctly, it information is going to be delete.
00471         # @param manual_dir - The manual directory path.
00472         def download_manuals(self, manual_dir):
00473                 for manual in self.__manuals['app_man_offline']:
00474                         try:
00475                                 if not os.path.exists(manual_dir+"/"+manual['app_man_off_file']):
00476                                         if manual['app_man_off_url'] != None:
00477                                                 sys.stderr.write("!! Getting " + manual['app_man_off_file'] + "... ")
00478                                                 if urllib.urlretrieve(manual['app_man_off_url'], manual_dir+"/"+manual['app_man_off_file']):
00479                                                         sys.stderr.write("Done\n")
00480                         except Exception, e:
00481                                 sys.stderr.write( "\nEE Error downloading application's manual (\"" + manual['app_man_off_file']+ "\")from \"" + self.__name + "\".\n")
00482                                 sys.stderr.write(str(e) + "\n") 
00483                                 
00484                                 self.__manuals['app_man_offline'].remove( manual )
00485                                 self.__to_save = 1
00486                                 pass
00487 
00488         ## Download the application's software.
00489         #
00490         # If any software don't ownload correctly, it App is going to be unselect.
00491         # @param software_dir - The softwares path.
00492         def download_software(self,software_dir):
00493                 try:
00494                         if not os.path.exists(software_dir+"/"+self.__file):
00495                                 sys.stderr.write("!! Getting " + self.__file + "... ") 
00496                                 if urllib.urlretrieve(self.__software_url, software_dir + "/" + self.__file):
00497                                         sys.stderr.write("Done\n")
00498                                         self.__md5sum = self.__get_md5_hash(software_dir + "/" + self.__file)
00499                                 while self.__get_md5_hash(software_dir + "/" + self.__file) != self.__md5sum:
00500                                         sys.stderr.write("\nEE md5 signatures don't match.\n")
00501                                         sys.stderr.write( "Getting " + self.__file + "... ")
00502                                         os.remove(software_dir+"/"+self.__file)
00503                                         if urllib.urlretrieve(self.__software_url, software_dir + "/" + self.__file):
00504                                                 sys.stderr.write("Done\n")
00505                                                 self.__md5sum = self.__get_md5_hash(software_dir + "/" + self.__file)
00506                 except Exception, e:
00507                         sys.stderr.write("\nEE Error downloading application's software from \"" + self.__name + "\".\n")
00508                         sys.stderr.write(str(e) + "\n")
00509                         sys.stdout.write("\nERROR: \"" +  self.__name + "\" will not be including.\n")
00510                         self.__included = 0
00511                         pass

00513         ## Add a new online manual to this App.

00518         def add_manual_online(self, values):
00519                 manu = {}
00520                 if isinstance(values[0], unicode): manu['app_man_on_name'] = values[0].encode('utf8')
00521                 else: manu['app_man_on_name'] = values[0]
00522                 if isinstance(values[1], unicode): manu['app_man_on_url'] = values[1].encode('utf8')
00523                 else: manu['app_man_on_url'] = values[1]
00524                 if isinstance(values[2], unicode): manu['app_man_on_description'] = values[2].encode('utf8')
00525                 else: manu['app_man_on_description'] = values[2]
00526                 if isinstance(values[3], unicode): manu['app_man_on_lang'] = values[3].encode('utf8')
00527                 else: manu['app_man_on_lang'] = values[3]
00528             
00529                 self.__manuals['app_man_online'].append(manu)

00551                 self.__to_save = 1
00552         
00553         ## Calculate the md5 hash.
00554         #
00555         # @param filename - The path to the file we want the md5 hash.
00556         # @return md5 hash.
00557         def __get_md5_hash(self,filename):
00558                 f = open(filename,'rb')
00559                 hsh = md5.new()
00560                 hsh.update(f.read())
00561                 f.close()
00562                 return hsh.hexdigest()
00563 
00564         ## Create a dictionary with all App information.
00565         #
00566         # @return A dictionary with all App information
00567         def get_app_dict(self):
00568                 dict = {}
00569                 dict['name'] = self.__name
00570                 dict['version'] = self.__version
00571                 dict['site'] = self.__site 
00572                 dict['manuals'] = self.__manuals
00573                 dict['plataforms'] = self.__plataforms
00574                 dict['minidescription'] = self.__minidescription
00575                 dict['description'] = self.__description
00576                 dict['file'] = self.__file
00577                 dict['software_url'] = self.__software_url
00578                 dict['icon'] = self.__icon
00579                 dict['icon_url'] = self.__icon_url
00580                 dict['md5sum'] = self.__md5sum
00581                 dict['included'] = self.__included
00582                 dict['html_file'] = self.__html_file
00583                 dict['categories'] = self.__categories
00584                 dict['alternatives'] = self.__alternatives
00585                 return dict;
00586 
00587         ## Generate the App XML Element.
00588         #
00589         # @return App XML Element.
00590         def gen_xml_element(self):
00591                 app = Element("APP")
00592                 
00593                 name = SubElement(app,"APP_NAME")
00594                 name.text = self.__name.decode('utf8')
00595 
00596                 version = SubElement(app,"APP_VERSION")
00597                 version.text = self.__version.decode('utf8')
00598 
00599                 site = SubElement(app,"APP_SITE")
00600                 site.text = self.__site.decode('utf8')
00601 
00602                 manuals = SubElement(app,"APP_MANUALS")
00603                 for man in self.__manuals['app_man_online']:
00604                         man_on = SubElement(manuals, "APP_MAN_ONLINE")
00605                         m_name = SubElement(man_on, "APP_MAN_ONLINE_NAME")
00606                         m_name.text = man['app_man_on_name'].decode('utf8')
00607                         m_url = SubElement(man_on, "APP_MAN_ONLINE_URL")
00608                         m_url.text = man['app_man_on_url'].decode('utf8')
00609                         m_description = SubElement(man_on, "APP_MAN_ONLINE_DESCRIPTION")
00610                         m_description.text = man['app_man_on_description'].decode('utf8')
00611                         m_lang = SubElement(man_on, "APP_MAN_ONLINE_LANG")
00612                         m_lang.text = man['app_man_on_lang'].decode('utf8')
00613                 for man in self.__manuals['app_man_offline']:
00614                         man_off = SubElement(manuals, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE")
00615                         m_name = SubElement(man_off, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE_NAME")
00616                         m_name.text = man['app_man_off_name'].decode('utf8')
00617                         m_url = SubElement(man_off, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE_URL")
00618                         m_url.text = man['app_man_off_url'].decode('utf8')
00619                         m_file = SubElement(man_off, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE_FILE")
00620                         m_file.text = man['app_man_off_file'].decode('utf8')
00621                         m_description = SubElement(man_off, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION")
00622                         m_description.text = man['app_man_off_description'].decode('utf8')
00623                         m_lang = SubElement(man_off, "APP_MAN_OFFLINE_LANG")
00624                         m_lang.text = man['app_man_off_lang'].decode('utf8')
00625                 
00626                 plataforms = SubElement(app,"APP_PLATAFORMS")
00627                 plats = []
00628                 for plataform in self.__plataforms:
00629                         plats.append(SubElement(plataforms,"APP_PLAT"))
00630                         plats[-1].text = plataform.decode('utf8')
00631 
00632                 minidescription = SubElement(app,"APP_MINIDESCRIPTION")
00633                 minidescription.text = self.__minidescription.decode('utf8')
00634 
00635                 description = SubElement(app,"APP_DESCRIPTION")
00636                 description.text = self.__description.decode('utf8')
00637 
00638                 file = SubElement(app,"APP_FILE")
00639                 file.text = self.__file.decode('utf8')
00640 
00641                 download_url = SubElement(app,"APP_DOWNLOAD_URL")
00642                 download_url.text = self.__software_url.decode('utf8')
00643 
00644                 icon = SubElement(app,"APP_ICON")
00645                 icon.text = self.__icon.decode('utf8')
00646 
00647                 icon_url = SubElement(app,"APP_ICON_URL")
00648                 icon_url.text = self.__icon_url.decode('utf8')
00649 
00650                 md5sum = SubElement(app,"APP_MD5SUM")
00651                 md5sum.text = self.__md5sum.decode('utf8')
00652 
00653                 categories = SubElement(app,"APP_CATEGORIES")
00654                 cats = []
00655                 for category in self.__categories:
00656                         cats.append(SubElement(categories,"APP_CATEGORY"))
00657                         cats[-1].text = category.decode('utf8')
00658 
00659                 alternatives = SubElement(app,"APP_ALTERNATIVES")
00660                 alts = []
00661                 for alternative in self.__alternatives:
00662                         alts.append(SubElement(alternatives,"APP_ALT"))
00663                         alts[-1].text = alternative.decode('utf8')
00664 
00665                 return app
00666

00786         ## Set the App manual List Dictionary.
00787         #
00788         # @param mans - New App manual Dictionary.
00789         #
00790         # @see App.__manuals 
00791         def set_manuals(self, mans):
00792                 manuals = {'app_man_online':[],
00793                            'app_man_offline':[]}
00794 
00795                 for man in mans['app_man_online']:
00796                         manu = {}
00797                         if isinstance(man['app_man_on_name'], unicode): manu['app_man_on_name'] = man['app_man_on_name'].encode('utf8')
00798                         else: manu['app_man_on_name'] = man['app_man_on_name']
00799                         if isinstance(man['app_man_on_url'], unicode): manu['app_man_on_url'] = man['app_man_on_url'].encode('utf8')
00800                         else: manu['app_man_on_url'] = man['app_man_on_url']
00801                         if isinstance(man['app_man_on_description'], unicode): manu['app_man_on_description'] = man['app_man_on_description'].encode('utf8')
00802                         else: manu['app_man_on_description'] = man['app_man_on_description']
00803                         if isinstance(man['app_man_on_lang'], unicode): manu['app_man_on_lang'] = man['app_man_on_lang'].encode('utf8')
00804                         else: manu['app_man_on_lang'] = man['app_man_on_lang']
00805                         manuals['app_man_online'].append(manu)
00806 
00807                 for man in mans['app_man_offline']:
00808                         manu = {}
00809                         if isinstance(man['app_man_off_name'], unicode): manu['app_man_off_name'] = man['app_man_off_name'].encode('utf8')
00810                         else: manu['app_man_off_name'] = man['app_man_off_name']
00811                         if isinstance(man['app_man_off_url'], unicode): manu['app_man_off_url'] = man['app_man_off_url'].encode('utf8')
00812                         else: manu['app_man_off_url'] = man['app_man_off_url']
00813                         if isinstance(man['app_man_off_file'], unicode): manu['app_man_off_file'] = man['app_man_off_file'].encode('utf8')
00814                         else: manu['app_man_off_file'] = man['app_man_off_file']
00815                         if isinstance(man['app_man_off_description'], unicode): manu['app_man_off_description'] = man['app_man_off_description'].encode('utf8')
00816                         else: manu['app_man_off_description'] = man['app_man_off_description']
00817                         if isinstance(man['app_man_off_lang'], unicode): manu['app_man_off_lang'] = man['app_man_off_lang'].encode('utf8')
00818                         else: manu['app_man_off_lang'] = man['app_man_off_lang']
00819                         manuals['app_man_offline'].append(manu)
00820 
00821                 self.__manuals = manuals

00906         ## Delete a Category from the Categoy list.
00907         #
00908         # @param category_label - The Category name it has been delete.
00909         # @return \b true/1 if it's delete or \b false/0 if it isn't.
00910         def del_category(self, category_label):
00911                 try:
00912                         self.__categories.remove(category_label)
00913                         return 1
00914                 except Exception:
00915                         return 0
00916 
00917         ## Change a Category from Category list. 
00918         #
00919         # @param old_category - The label of th Category it has been change.
00920         # @param new_category - The new label.
00921         # @return \b true/1 if it's correctly or \b false/0 if it isn't.
00922         def change_category(self, old_category, new_category):
00923                 try:
00924                         n = self.__categories.index(old_category)
00925                         if isinstance(new_category, unicode): self.__categories[n] = new_category.encode('utf8')
00926                         else: self.__categories[n] = new_category
00927                         return 1
00928                 except Exception:
00929                         return 0 
00930

00935                 alter = []

00937                         if isinstance(alt, unicode): alter.append(alt.encode('utf8'))
00938                         else: alter.append(alt)
00939                 self.__alternatives = alter

00941         ## Set application tu save.
00942         #
00943         # @param app_to_save - Value \b true/1 (to save) or \b false/0 (don't save).
00944         def set_to_save(self, app_to_save):
00945                 self.__to_save = app_to_save

00947         ## Find an App with the same name as \em name param in a App list.
00948         #
00949         # @param app_list - (list[]) App list.
00950         # @param app_name - App name.
00951         # @return App Object or None.
00952         def find_app( self, app_list, app_name):
00953                 #TODO: Optimize this method
00954 
00955                 app_list.sort()
00956                 for app in app_list:
00957                         if app.get_name().lower() == app_name.lower():
00958                                 return app
00959                 return None
00960         
00961         find_app = classmethod( find_app )      
00962         
00963         ## @var __name
00964         # The App name.
00965 
00966         ## @var __version
00967         # The App version.
00968         
00969         ## @var __site
00970         # The App Web Site url.
00971         
00972         ## @var __manuals
00973         # The App manuals Dictionary:
00974         #
00975         #       \li \em app_man_online  - List of On-Line Manuals dictionaries.
00976         #       \li \em app_man_online/app_man_on_name - On-Line manual name.
00977         #       \li \em app_man_online/app_man_on_url - On-Line manual url.
00978         #       \li \em app_man_online/app_man_on_description - On-Line manual description.
00979         #       \li \em app_man_online/app_man_on_lang - On-Line mnuals languages.
00980         #       
00981         #       \li \em app_man_offline - List of Off-Line Manuals dictionaries.
00982         #       \li \em app_man_offline/app_man_off_name - Off-Line manual name.
00983         #       \li \em app_man_offline/app_man_off_url - Off-Line manual url.
00984         #       \li \em app_man_offline/app_man_off_file - Off-Line manual file name. 
00985         #       \li \em app_man_offline/app_man_off_description - Off-Line manual description.
00986         #       \li \em app_man_offline/app_man_off_lang - Off-Line manual languages. 
00987         
00988         ## @var __plataforms
00989         # The App plataform List.
00990         
00991         ## @var __minidescription
00992         # The App minidescription. 
00993         
00994         ## @var __description
00995         # The App description
00996         
00997         ## @var __file
00998         # The App software file name.
00999         
01000         ## @var __software_url
01001         # The App software url.
01002         
01003         ## @var __icon
01004         # The App icon file name.
01005         
01006         ## @var __icon_url
01007         # The App icon url.
01008         
01009         ## @var __md5sum
01010         # The App md5sum.
01011         
01012         ## @var __categories
01013         # The App Category label List.
01014         
01015         ## @var __alternatives
01016         # The App alternatives List.
01017         
01018         ## @var __included
01019         # The App include value (\em true/1 or \em false/0).
01020         
01021         ## @var __to_save
01022         # The App to_save value (\em true/1 or \em false/0).
01023         
01024         ## @var __html_file
01025         # The App html file name.
01026 
01027 ## Class repreesent a WinSOL image, with the Categories and applications list.
01028 #
01029 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01030 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01031 class Image:
01032 
01033         ## Inicialice the Image atrivutes.
01034         #
01035         # @param xml_files - (list[5]) list of xml path files (sys_cat, sys_app, user_cat, user_app, user_includes)
01036         # @param dtd_files - (list[2]) list of dtd path files (cat_dtd, app_dtd, includes_dtd)
01037         def __init__(self, xml_files, dtd_files):
01038                 self.__categories = []
01039                 self.__apps = []
01040                 self.__sys_category_file = CategoriesDataFile( xml_files[0], dtd_files[0]  )
01041                 self.__sys_app_file  = AppsDataFile( xml_files[1], dtd_files[1] )
01042                 self.__user_category_file = CategoriesDataFile( xml_files[2], dtd_files[0] )
01043                 self.__user_app_file = AppsDataFile( xml_files[3], dtd_files[1] )
01044                 self.__user_include_file = IncludesDataFile( xml_files[4], dtd_files[2] )
01045         
01046                 # Verify the XML file
01047                 
01048                 do = 1
01049 
01050                 if( not self.__sys_category_file.check_XML_file() ): 
01051                         do = 0
01052                 if( not self.__sys_app_file.check_XML_file() ): 
01053                         do = 0
01054                 if( not self.__user_category_file.check_XML_file() ): 
01055                         do = 0
01056                 if( not self.__user_app_file.check_XML_file() ): 
01057                         do = 0
01058                 if( not self.__user_include_file.check_XML_file() ): 
01059                         do = 0 
01060                 
01061                 # get applications and categories
01062                 
01063                 if do == 1:
01064                         self.__sys_app_file.get_Apps(self.__apps)
01065                         self.__user_app_file.get_Apps(self.__apps, 1)
01066                         self.__apps.sort()
01067                         self.__sys_category_file.get_Categories(self.__categories)
01068                         self.__user_category_file.get_Categories(self.__categories, 1)
01069                         self.__categories.sort()
01070                         self.__insert_apps_into_category()
01071                         self.__user_include_file.set_includes(self.__categories, self.__apps)
01072         
01073         ## Privated method that insert all application in its categories.
01074         #
01075         def __insert_apps_into_category(self):
01076                 for app in self.__apps:
01077                         # Add apps without category
01078                         if len(app.get_categories()) == 0:
01079                                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, "none")
01080                                 if cat != None:
01081                                         cat.add_application(app)
01082                                 else:
01083                                         cat = Category(["No Categorized", "none", "Uncategorized applications."])
01084                                         self.__categories.append(cat)
01085                                         cat.add_application(app)
01086                         # Add apps with category
01087                         else:
01088                                 for cat_label in app.get_categories():
01089                                         cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat_label)
01090                                         if cat != None:
01091                                                 cat.add_application(app)
01092                                         
01093         ## Add a new Category to the Category List. If there is a Category with the same name, it don't insert it.
01094         # 
01095         # @param category_values - List of the values to the new Category. 
01096         # @return \b true/1 it's ok or \b false/0 it's failed, this Category exist.
01097         #
01098         # @see Category.__init__()
01099         def add_category(self, category_values):
01100                 cat = Category(category_values)
01101                 if Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat.get_label()) == None:
01102                         self.__categories.append(cat)
01103                         self.__categories.sort()
01104                         cat.set_to_save(1)
01105                         return 1
01106                 # There is one category with the same label"    
01107                 return 0
01108         
01109         ## Modify the Category, that it has the same label as \em category_label, with the new values.
01110         #
01111         # @param category_label - The label of the Category to be modifie.
01112         # @param category_value - A List of the new Category values.
01113         # return \b true/1 if it's ok, this Category has been modifie, or \b false/0 if it's failed, this Category don't exist.
01114         #
01115         # @see Category.set_name()
01116         # @see Category.set_description()
01117         def modify_category_values(self, category_label, category_value):
01118                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, category_label)
01119                 if cat == None:
01120                         return 0
01121                 else:   
01122                         cat.set_name(category_value[0])
01123                         cat.set_description(category_value[1])
01124                         cat.set_to_save(1)
01125                         return 1
01126 
01127         ## Delete the Category that it has the same label as \em category_label.
01128         #
01129         # @param category_label - The label of the Category to be delete.
01130         # @return \b true/1 if it's ok, the Category has been delete, or \b false/0 if it's failed. The Category don't exist or it's from the system XML file.
01131         def del_category(self, category_label):
01132                 c = Category.find_category(self.__categories, category_label)
01133                 if c != None:
01134                         if not c.is_to_save():
01135                                 # The category is from the system XML file
01136                                 return 0 
01137                 else:
01138                         # there isn't any category with this label
01139                         return 0
01140  
01141                 result_list = []
01142                 delete  =  0
01143                 for cat in self.__categories:
01144                         if cat.get_label().lower() != category_label.lower():
01145                                 result_list.append(cat)
01146                         else:
01147                                 delete = 1
01148                                 # Delete to app.categories
01149                                 #if cat.is_to_save():
01150                                 for app in cat.get_all_apps():
01151                                         app.del_category(category_label)
01152                                         app.set_to_save( 1 )
01153                 self.__categories = result_list
01154                 self.__categories.sort()
01155                 return delete
01156 
01157         ## Add a new App to the App List. If there is one with the same name. It don't include.
01158         #
01159         # @param app_values - The new App values.
01160         # @return \b true/1 if it's ok or \b false/0 if it's failed. This App exist.
01161         #
01162         # @see App.__init__()
01163         def add_app(self, app_values):
01164                 app = App(app_values)
01165                 if App.find_app(self.__apps, app.get_name()) == None:
01166                         self.__apps.append(app)
01167                         self.__apps.sort()
01168                         app.set_to_save( 1 )
01169                         if len(app.get_categories()) == 0:
01170                                 # The app isn't from any category
01171                                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, "none")
01172                                 if cat != None:
01173                                         cat.add_application(app)
01174                                 else:
01175                                         cat = Category(["No Categorized", "none", "Uncategorized applications."])
01176                                         self.__categories.append(cat)
01177                                         cat.add_application(app)
01178                         else:
01179                                 # The app is from any category
01180                                 for cat_label in app.get_categories():
01181                                         cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat_label)
01182                                         if cat != None:
01183                                                 cat.add_application(app)
01184                                         else:
01185                                                 app.del_category(cat_label)
01186                         return 1
01187                 # There is a App with the same name"
01188                 return 0
01189         
01190         ## Modify the App, that it has the same name as \em app_name, with the new values.
01191         #
01192         # @param app_name - The name of the App to be modifie.
01193         # @param app_values - A List of the new App values.
01194         # return \b true/1 if it's ok, this App has been modifie, or \b false/0 if it's failed, this App don't exist.
01195         #
01196         # @see App.set_version()
01197         # @see App.set_site()
01198         # @see App.set_manuals()
01199         # @see App.set_plataforms()
01200         # @see App.set_minidescription()
01201         # @see App.set_description()
01202         # @see App.set_file_name()
01203         # @see App.set_software_url()
01204         # @see App.set_icon_name()
01205         # @see App.set_icon_url()
01206         # @see App.set_md5sum()
01207         # @see App.set_categories()
01208         # @see App.set_alternatives()
01209         def modify_app_values(self, app_name, app_values):
01210                 app = App.find_app(self.__apps, app_name)
01211                 if app == None:
01212                         return 0
01213                 else:
01214                         app.set_version(app_values[0])
01215                         app.set_site(app_values[1])
01216                         app.set_manuals(app_values[2])
01217                         app.set_plataforms(app_values[3])
01218                         app.set_minidescription(app_values[4])
01219                         app.set_description(app_values[5])
01220                         app.set_file_name(app_values[6])
01221                         app.set_software_url(app_values[7])
01222                         app.set_icon_name(app_values[8])
01223                         app.set_icon_url(app_values[9])
01224                         app.set_md5sum(app_values[10])
01225 
01226                         oldcats = app.get_categories()
01227                         if len(oldcats) == 0:
01228                                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, "none")
01229                                 cat.del_application(app.get_name())
01230                                 if len(cat.get_all_apps()) == 0: # Delete "None" category if it isn't any app
01231                                         self.__categories.remove(cat)
01232                         else:
01233                                 for cat_label in oldcats:
01234                                         cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat_label)
01235                                         if cat != None:
01236                                                 cat.del_application(app.get_name())
01237                         
01238                         newcats = app_values[11]
01239                         app.set_categories(newcats)
01240                         if len(newcats) == 0:
01241                                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, "none")
01242                                 if cat != None:
01243                                         cat.add_application(app)
01244                                 else:
01245                                         cat = Category(["No Categorized", "none", "Uncategorized applications."])
01246                                         self.__categories.append(cat)
01247                                         cat.add_application(app)
01248                         else:
01249                                 for cat_label in newcats:
01250                                         cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat_label)
01251                                         if cat != None:
01252                                                 cat.add_application(app)
01253                                         else:
01254                                                 app.del_category(cat_label)
01255 
01256                         app.set_alternatives(app_values[12])
01257                         app.set_to_save(1)
01258                         return 1
01259 
01260         ## Delete the App that it has the same name as \em app_name.
01261         #
01262         # @param app_name - The name of the App to be delete.
01263         # @return \b true/1 if it's ok, the App has been delete, or \b false/0 if it's failed. The App don't exist or it's from the system XML file.
01264         def del_app(self, app_name):
01265                 result_list = []
01266                 delete = 0
01267                 for app in self.__apps:
01268                         if app.get_name().lower() != app_name.lower():
01269                                 result_list.append(app)
01270                         else:
01271                                 # The App is delete"
01272                                 delete = 1
01273                                 if len(app.get_categories()) == 0:
01274                                         cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, "none")
01275                                         if cat != None:
01276                                                 cat.del_application(app_name)
01277                                 else:
01278                                         for cat_label in app.get_categories():
01279                                                 cat = Category.find_category(self.__categories, cat_label)
01280                                                 if cat != None:
01281                                                         cat.del_application(app_name)
01282                 self.__apps = result_list
01283                 self.__apps.sort()
01284                 return delete

01440         ## Generate the image html files from all selected categories and applications.
01441         #
01442         # @param html_dir - Path to generate the html structure.
01443         # @param template_dir - Path to html template directory.
01444         def gen_html(self, html_dir, template_dir):
01445                 if not os.path.exists(html_dir): return 0
01446                 if not os.path.exists(template_dir + "/category.tmpl"): return 0
01447                 if not os.path.exists(template_dir + "/application.tmpl"): return 0
01448                 if not os.path.exists(template_dir + "/index.tmpl"): return 0
01449                 
01450                 if not os.path.exists(html_dir + "/apps"): 
01451                         os.mkdir(html_dir + "/apps")
01452                 if not os.path.exists(html_dir + "/categories"): 
01453                         os.mkdir(html_dir + "/categories")
01454 
01455                 # Adding aditional images
01456                 if os.path.exists(template_dir + "/mis"):
01457                         if os.path.exists(html_dir + "/mis"):
01458                                 os.system( "rm -rf '"+ html_dir +"/mis" +"'" )
01459                         os.system( "cp -rf "+ template_dir + "/mis " + "'" + html_dir +"/mis" +"'" )
01460                 
01461                 categories = []
01462                 for cat in self.__categories:
01463                         if cat.is_included():
01464                                 categories.append(cat.get_category_dict())
01465                 
01466                 index = Template( file = template_dir + "/index.tmpl",  searchList = [ {'categories' : categories} ] )  
01467                 
01468                 f = open( html_dir + "/index.html", 'w')
01469                 f.write( "" + str(index) )
01470                 f.close()
01471                 
01472                 for cat in categories:
01473                         category = Template( file = template_dir + "/category.tmpl",  searchList = [ {'category' : cat, 'categories' : categories} ]  )
01474                         f = open( html_dir + "/categories/" + cat['html_file'], 'w')
01475                         f.write( str(category))
01476                         f.close()
01477 
01478                         for app in cat['apps']:
01479                                 if app['included']:
01480                                         if not os.path.exists(html_dir +"/apps/" + app['html_file']):
01481                                                 application = Template( file = template_dir + "/application.tmpl",  searchList = [ {'application' : app, 'categories': categories} ] )
01482                                                 
01483                                                 f = open( html_dir + "/apps/" + app['html_file'], 'w')
01484                                                 f.write( "" + str(application) )
01485                                                 f.close()
01486         
01487                 return 1
01488         
01489         ## Make the iso image from \em image_dir path to \em iso_file path.
01490         #
01491         # @param image_dir - Path of image directory.
01492         # @param iso_file - Path of iso file.
01493         # @return \b true/1 if it has been created or \b false/0 if it hasn't been created.     
01494         def make_iso(self, image_dir, iso_file):
01495                 if not os.path.exists(image_dir): 
01496                         return 0
01497                 else:
01498                         os.system( "mkisofs -J -R -f -o '" + iso_file + "' '" + image_dir + "'" )
01499                         return 1

01647         
01648 ## Superclass to control the XML file imput/output.
01649 #
01650 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01651 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01652 class DataFile:
01653 
01654         ## Inicialice the DataFile values.
01655         #
01656         # @param xml_file - XML file path.
01657         # @param dtd_file - DTD file path.
01658         def __init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file ):
01659                 self.__xml_file = xml_file
01660                 self.__dtd_file = dtd_file
01661                 self.__check = 0
01662 
01663         ## Check the XML integrity, with the DTD, and parser it.
01664         #
01665         # @return \em true/1 if it has been cheked or \em false/0 if it hasn't.
01666         def check_XML_file(self):
01667                 dtd = xmldtd.load_dtd( self.__dtd_file)
01668                 parser = xmlproc.XMLProcessor()
01669                 parser.set_application(xmlval.ValidatingApp(dtd, parser))
01670                 parser.dtd = dtd
01671                 parser.ent = dtd
01672                 try:
01673                         parser.parse_resource(self.__xml_file)
01674                         self.__check = 1
01675                         self.__tree = parse( self.__xml_file )
01676                 except Exception, e:
01677                         sys.stderr.write("EE Error in XML-File \"" + self.__xml_file + "\" validation\n")
01678                         self.__check = 0
01679                 return self.__check
01680 
01681         ## Returnthe check value.
01682         #
01683         # @return \em true/1 if it has been cheked or \em false/0 if it hasn't.
01684         def is_cheked(self):
01685                 return self.__check
01686 
01687         ## Write the applications_list to the XML file with the applications DTD structure.
01688         #
01689         # @param app_list - Application list.
01690         def write_apps_to_XML_file(self, app_list):
01691                 root = Element("APPLICATIONS")
01692                 for app in app_list:
01693                         if app.is_to_save():
01694                                 root.append(app.gen_xml_element())
01695                 self.__tree = ElementTree(root)
01696                 self.__tree.write(self.__xml_file)
01697 
01698         ## Write the categories list to the XML file with the categories DTD structure.
01699         #
01700         # @param category_list - Categories list.
01701         def write_categories_to_XML_file(self, category_list):
01702                 root = Element("CATEGORIES")
01703                 for category in category_list:
01704                         if category.is_to_save():
01705                                 root.append(category.gen_xml_element())
01706                 self.__tree = ElementTree(root)
01707                 self.__tree.write(self.__xml_file)
01708 
01709         ## Write the includes list of category and applications with the includes DTD structure.
01710         #
01711         # @param category_list - Categories list.
01712         # @param app_list - Application list.
01713         def write_includes_to_XML_file(self, category_list, app_list):
01714                 root = Element("INCLUDES")
01715                 categories = SubElement(root,"CATEGORIES")
01716                 for cat in category_list:
01717                         if cat.is_included():
01718                                 label = SubElement(categories,"CAT_LABEL")
01719                                 label.text = cat.get_label().decode('utf8')
01720                 applications = SubElement(root,"APPLICATIONS")
01721                 for app in app_list:    
01722                         if app.is_included():
01723                                 name = SubElement(applications,"APP_NAME")
01724                                 name.text = app.get_name().decode('utf8')
01725                 self.__tree = ElementTree(root)
01726                 self.__tree.write(self.__xml_file)
01727         
01728         ## Get the XML path file.
01729         #
01730         # @return The XML path  file value.
01731         def get_XML_file(self):
01732                 return self.__xml_file
01733 
01734         ## Get the DTD path file.
01735         #
01736         # @return The DTD path file value.
01737         def get_DTD_file(self):
01738                 return self.__dtd_file
01739 
01740         ## Get the Tree structure.
01741         #
01742         # @return The ElementTree structure.
01743         def get_tree(self):
01744                 return self.__tree
01745         
01746         ## Set the XML path file.
01747         #
01748         # @param xml_file - New XML path file.
01749         def set_XML_file(self, xml_file):
01750                 self.__xml_file = xml_file
01751                 self.__check = 0
01752 
01753         ## Set the DTD path file. 
01754         #
01755         # @param dtd_file - New DTD path file.
01756         def set_DTD_file(self, dtd_file):
01757                 self.__dtd_file = dtd_file
01758                 self.__check = 0
01759

01761         # The DTD file path.
01762 
01763         ## @var __xml_file
01764         # the XML file path.

01767         # Check value (\em true/1 or \em false/0)

01772 ## Class represent the Application XML file input/output.
01773 #
01774 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01775 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01776 class AppsDataFile(DataFile):
01777 
01778         ## Inicialice AppsDataFile.
01779         #
01780         # @param xml_file - XML path file.
01781         # @param dtd_file - DTD path file.
01782         #
01783         # @see DataFile.__init_()
01784         def __init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file ):
01785                 DataFile.__init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file)
01786         
01787         ## Add all applications from XML file to the App List.
01788         #
01789         # @param app_list - The application list.
01790         # @param save - The save value (0 to System App 1 to User App).
01791         # @return \em true/1 if it is correct or \em false/0 if isn't correct.
01792         def get_Apps(self, app_list, save = 0):
01793                 if( DataFile.is_cheked(self) == 0):
01794                         sys.stderr.write("EE The XML-File \"" + DataFile.get_XML_file(self) + "\" is not checked\n")
01795                         return 0 
01796                 else:
01797                         for application in DataFile.get_tree(self).findall("/./APP"):
01798                                 name = application.findall("./APP_NAME")[0].text
01799                                 
01800                                 version = application.findall("./APP_VERSION")[0].text
01801 
01802                                 site = application.findall("./APP_SITE")[0].text
01803                                 
01804                                 manuals = {}
01805                                 man_on = []
01806                                 for manual in application.findall("./APP_MANUALS/APP_MAN_ONLINE"):
01807                                         m_on = {}
01808                                         m_on['app_man_on_name'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_ONLINE_NAME")[0].text
01809                                         m_on['app_man_on_url'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_ONLINE_URL")[0].text
01810                                         m_on['app_man_on_description'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_ONLINE_DESCRIPTION")[0].text
01811                                         m_on['app_man_on_lang'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_ONLINE_LANG")[0].text
01812                                         man_on.append(m_on)
01813                                 manuals['app_man_online'] = man_on
01814                                 man_off = []
01815                                 for manual in application.findall("./APP_MANUALS/APP_MAN_OFFLINE"):
01816                                         m_off = {}
01817                                         m_off['app_man_off_name'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_OFFLINE_NAME")[0].text
01818                                         m_off['app_man_off_url'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_OFFLINE_URL")[0].text
01819                                         m_off['app_man_off_file'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_OFFLINE_FILE")[0].text
01820                                         m_off['app_man_off_description'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION")[0].text
01821                                         m_off['app_man_off_lang'] = manual.findall("./APP_MAN_OFFLINE_LANG")[0].text
01822                                         man_off.append(m_off)
01823                                 manuals['app_man_offline'] = man_off
01824 
01825                                 plataforms =[]
01826                                 for app_plataform in application.findall("./APP_PLATAFORMS/APP_PLAT"):
01827                                         plataforms.append(app_plataform.text)
01828 
01829                                 minidescription = application.findall("./APP_MINIDESCRIPTION")[0].text
01830                                 
01831                                 description = application.findall("./APP_DESCRIPTION")[0].text
01832 
01833                                 file = application.findall("./APP_FILE")[0].text
01834 
01835                                 download_url = application.findall("./APP_DOWNLOAD_URL")[0].text
01836 
01837                                 icon = application.findall("./APP_ICON")[0].text
01838 
01839                                 icon_url = application.findall("./APP_ICON_URL")[0].text
01840 
01841                                 md5sum = application.findall("./APP_MD5SUM")[0].text
01842 
01843                                 categories =[]
01844                                 for app_category in application.findall("./APP_CATEGORIES/APP_CATEGORY"):
01845                                         categories.append(app_category.text)
01846 
01847                                 alternatives = []
01848                                 for app_alternative in application.findall("./APP_ALTERNATIVES/APP_ALT"):
01849                                         alternatives.append(app_alternative.text)
01850                                 
01851                                 applicat = App.find_app(app_list, name)
01852                                 if applicat == None:
01853                                         app = App( [name, version, site, manuals, plataforms, minidescription, description, file, download_url, icon, icon_url, md5sum, categories, alternatives] )
01854                                         app.set_to_save(save)
01855                                         app_list.append(app)
01856                                 else:
01857                                         applicat.set_version( version )
01858                                         applicat.set_site( site )
01859                                         applicat.set_manuals( manuals )
01860                                         applicat.set_plataforms ( plataforms )
01861                                         applicat.set_minidescription( minidescription )
01862                                         applicat.set_description( description )
01863                                         applicat.set_file_name( file )
01864                                         applicat.set_software_url( download_url )
01865                                         applicat.set_icon_name( icon )
01866                                         applicat.set_icon_url( icon_url )
01867                                         applicat.set_md5sum( md5sum )
01868                                         applicat.set_categories( categories )
01869                                         applicat.set_alternatives( alternatives )
01870                                         applicat.set_to_save( 1 )
01871                         app_list.sort()
01872                         return 1
01873 
01874         ## Write the applications list to XML file.
01875         #
01876         # @param app_list - Applications list.
01877         #
01878         # @see DataFile.write_apps_to_XML_file()
01879         def write_to_XML_file(self, app_list ):
01880                 DataFile.write_apps_to_XML_file( self, app_list )

01882 ## Class represent the Categories XML file input/output.
01883 #
01884 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01885 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01886 class CategoriesDataFile(DataFile):
01887 
01888         ## Inicialice CategoriesDataFile.
01889         #
01890         # @param xml_file - XML path file.
01891         # @param dtd_file - DTD path file.
01892         #
01893         # @see DataFile.__init__()
01894         def __init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file ):
01895                 DataFile.__init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file)
01896         
01897         ## Add all categories from XML file to the categories list.
01898         #
01899         # @param category_list - The categories list.
01900         # @param save - The save value (0 to System Category 1 to User Category).
01901         # @return \em true/1 if it is correct or \em false/0 if isn't correct.
01902         def get_Categories(self, category_list, save =  0):
01903                 if( DataFile.is_cheked(self) == 0):
01904                         sys.stdout.write("EE The XML-File \"" + DataFile.get_XML_file(self) + "\" is not checked")
01905                         return 0
01906                 else:
01907                         for category in DataFile.get_tree(self).findall("/./CATEGORY"):
01908                                 name = category.findall("./CAT_NAME")[0].text
01909 
01910                                 label = category.findall("./CAT_LABEL")[0].text
01911 
01912                                 description = category.findall("./CAT_DESCRIPTION")[0].text
01913 
01914                                 categ =  Category.find_category(category_list, label)   
01915                                 if categ == None:
01916                                         cat = Category( [name, label, description] )
01917                                         cat.set_to_save(save)
01918                                         category_list.append(cat)
01919                                 else:
01920                                         categ.set_name(name)
01921                                         categ.set_description(description)
01922                                         categ.set_to_save(save)
01923                         return 1

01933 ## Class represent the Includes XML file input/output.
01934 #
01935 # @author David Barragán Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01936 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01937 class IncludesDataFile(DataFile):
01938         
01939         ## nicialice IncludesDataFile.
01940         #
01941         # @param xml_file - XML path file.
01942         # @param dtd_file - DTD path file.
01943         #
01944         # @see DataFile.__init__()
01945         def __init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file ):
01946                 DataFile.__init__(self, xml_file, dtd_file)
01947 
01948         ## Set the included status to all categories and applications from XML file to the categories list and applications list.
01949         #
01950         # @param category_list - The categories list.
01951         # @param app_list - The application list.
01952         # @return \em true/1 if it is correct or \em false/0 if isn't correct.
01953         def set_includes(self, category_list, app_list):        
01954                 if( DataFile.is_cheked(self) == 0):
01955                         sys.stderr.write("EE The XML-File \"" + DataFile.get_XML_file(self) + "\" is not checked")
01956                         return 0
01957                 else:
01958                         for cat_label in DataFile.get_tree(self).findall("/./CATEGORIES/CAT_LABEL"):
01959                                 cat = Category.find_category(category_list, cat_label.text)
01960                                 if cat != None:
01961                                         cat.select_category()
01962                         for  app_name in DataFile.get_tree(self).findall("/./APPLICATIONS/APP_NAME"):
01963                                 app = App.find_app(app_list, app_name.text)
01964                                 if app != None:
01965                                         app.select_app()
01966                         return 1
01967         
01968         ## Write the includes values to XML file.
01969         #
01970         # @param category_list - Categories list.
01971         # @param app_list - Applications list.
01972         #
01973         # @see DataFile.write_includes_to_XML_file()
01974         def write_to_XML_file(self, category_list, app_list ):
01975                 DataFile.write_includes_to_XML_file( self, category_list, app_list )
